thread.title: The high cost of police misconduct: Cleveland agreed to $13.2 million in settlements over two years
thread.title_full: The high cost of police misconduct: Cleveland agreed to $13.2 million in settlements over two years

author: Eric Heisig, cleveland.com
title: The high cost of police misconduct: Cleveland agreed to $13.2 million in settlements over two years
text: The city of Cleveland has settled 26 cases involving allegations of misconduct between 2015 and the present, agreeing to pay more than $13.2 million in the process.
